articles.author: David Pilling, Jonathan Wheatley, Aanu Adeoye
articles.title: End to Nigeria currency peg causes biggest fall in naira's history - Financial Times
articles.description: Abandonment of years-long policy follows removal of central bank chief Godwin Emefiele
articles.content:
Nigeria has abandoned its years-long currency peg and allowed the naira to trade freely, traders and local bankers said, prompting the biggest single-day fall in its history.
The about-turn, which h… [+3700 chars]
